title: Vertical green line on Pixel 3a display, after a while display stopped working
content:
After 5 days of use, a vertical green line appeared on the left side of my Google PIxel 3a phone.

It appeared at 17h, and later, at 21h screen completely stopped working.

Between 17h and 21h, while I was using the phone, green line was changing width, disappearing and getting back periodically, and changing height depending on the content displayed on the screen.

No drops or physical damages occurred and phone was handled very gentle during these days.

I tried factory reset. Didn't helped.


Any help is appreciated. Thanks.
